feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:25 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then clearing. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
